description: Retrieves information about a resource that was analyzed.

parameters.name: analyzerArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the analyzer to retrieve information from.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the resource to retrieve information about.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the resource that was analyzed.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The type of the resource that was analyzed.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the finding was created.

nested_items.name: analyzedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the resource was analyzed.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the finding was updated.

nested_items.name: isPublic
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the policy that generated the finding grants public access to the resource.

nested_items.name: actions
nested_items.description: The actions that an external principal is granted permission to use by the policy that generated the finding.

nested_items.name: sharedVia
nested_items.description: Indicates how the access that generated the finding is granted. This is populated for Amazon S3 bucket findings.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the finding generated from the analyzed resource.

nested_items.name: resourceOwnerAccount
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID that owns the resource.
